column4: Does someone know how to fix this.... "ndiswrapper (iw_set_ap_address:645): setting AP mac address failed (C0010015)" ?
i am trying to get wifi work with wpa_supplicant and ndiswrapper
Does someone know how to fix this.... "ndiswrapper (iw_set_ap_address:645): setting AP mac address failed (C0010015)" ?
what chipset wireless device are you using?
try this link. Just change the info for your chip set http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=185174
when you do an lspci what does it say about your wireless card?
Ethernet controller: Linksys, A Division of Cisco Systems [AirConn]  INPROCOMM IPN 2220 Wireless LAN Adapter (rev 01)
all depends on your IRC client
ill read your link and ... ill try with other ndiswrapper
